page.title: 10Ecology
page.content: There is a lot of pollution in this area. By the motorway there are a lot of fumes from the cars.For example;a man who lives next to the motorway has seen a white substance on his apples. Also there is a danger of a chemical leak from the{Nuclear power station.} A white foamy substance has been seen in nearby streams which finally run into the river Severn.This could have been caused by car exhausts. There is no evidence of major pollution on nearby farms.But there is always the threat of pollution from {slurry pits}which can overflow into streams and rivers killing the fish by extracting the oxygen.
